instructions.name: add_authority
docs: Add a whitelisted oracle authority

instructions.name: award_trophy
docs: Award a trophy to a user

instructions.name: buy
docs: Buy tokens from the bonding curve
NOTE: This runs on Ephemeral Rollup automatically due to #[ephemeral] directive
The rollup provides <50ms latency and gasless execution for users

accounts.name: market_sol_account
docs: Market SOL account (PDA for SOL storage)

accounts.name: news_account
docs: News account for minting authority

instructions.name: close_flash_market
docs: Close flash market and record final velocity

instructions.name: commit
docs: Commit rollup state back to main chain

instructions.name: compute_ai_trend_index
docs: Compute AI trend index on-chain within an Ephemeral Rollup session
This instruction accepts market factors and computes the adaptive trend score
The computation happens within ER for <50ms latency and gasless execution

instructions.name: create_flash_market
docs: Create a flash trend market for high-frequency velocity trading

instructions.name: delegate
docs: Manually delegate the market to a specific ephemeral rollup validator
NOTE: With #[ephemeral] directive, this is optional - most operations are already on ER
Use this for explicit cross-rollup delegation when needed

accounts.name: news_account
docs: The news account to get seeds from

accounts.name: market
docs: The market PDA to delegate

instructions.name: get_all_news_tokens
docs: Get all news tokens with optional filtering and pagination
This is a view function that doesn't modify state

accounts.name: requester
docs: The account requesting the news tokens

instructions.name: get_current_price
docs: Get the current price for buying 1 token

instructions.name: get_market_cap
docs: Get the market cap in lamports (price * circulating_supply)

instructions.name: get_news_by_author
docs: Get news tokens by a specific author
This function returns the news account data for a specific author and nonce

accounts.name: news_account
docs: The news account to retrieve

accounts.name: requester
docs: The account requesting the news token data

instructions.name: initialize_oracle
docs: Initialize the oracle with whitelisted authorities

instructions.name: initialize_profile
docs: Initialize a user profile for tracking PnL and stats

instructions.name: initialize_season
docs: Initialize a new season

instructions.name: migrate_clear_staking
docs: One-time migration: return staked tokens and pay accumulated fees to author

accounts.name: market_sol_account
docs: Market SOL account (PDA for SOL storage)

instructions.name: publish_news
docs: Publishes a new news story and creates a tradable token

instructions.name: record_trade_pnl
docs: Record trade PnL for a user

instructions.name: reset_season_pnl
docs: Reset season PnL for a user (admin only)

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sell tokens back to the bonding curve
NOTE: This runs on Ephemeral Rollup automatically due to #[ephemeral] directive

accounts.name: market_sol_account
docs: Market SOL account (PDA for SOL storage)

accounts.name: news_account
docs: News account for minting authority

instructions.name: undelegate
docs: Undelegate the market from the delegation program

accounts.name: news_account
docs: The news account to get seeds from

accounts.name: market
docs: The market PDA to undelegate

instructions.name: update_summary_link
docs: Update the AI summary link for a news token

instructions.name: update_trend_index
docs: Update the AI-powered trend index score for a market
This runs within an Ephemeral Rollup session for optimized execution

errors.name: HeadlineTooLong
errors.msg: Headline exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: LinkTooLong
errors.msg: Link exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: AlreadyDelegated
errors.msg: Market is already delegated to a rollup

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow in bonding curve calculation

errors.name: InvalidAccount
errors.msg: Account must be a system account (no data)

errors.name: FlashMarketNotExpired
errors.msg: Flash market has not expired yet
